title: Book cover "Outliers" by Malcolm Gladwell
content:
two year member and first time posting. can anyone tell me the typestyle for the book cover? also what is the typestyle for the text?

any help is greatly appreciated.
author: ngurra

comments.content: A simple picture would help us lazy identifiers. :)

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/platinumblondelife5/3222123187/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141123064111/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/platinumblondelife5/3222123187/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/platinumblondelife5/3222123187/")  
If it's this cover:  
For the title "Outliers" I think you are looking for [Spectrum](http://web.archive.org/web/20141123064111/http:/www.linotype.com/1491/spectrum-family.html?PHPSESSID=7c86b2ba943087a323153a282ab97281&subviewmode=FONTS&samplestr=Outliers)

As for the other stuff on the cover it's Adobe Garamond (But Not Premiere)

Now body text you should show us a sample!
[This copy](http://web.archive.org/web/20141123064111/http:/www.amazon.com/reader/0316017922?_encoding=UTF8&ref_=sib%5Fdp%5Fpt#reader) uses Stempel Garamond for body text.

You all are too kind for a newbie such as me. I should have attached a picture(s) to my initial post. Apologies (my bad!). Live and learn. Even with my oversight, you all contributed. For this I am thankful.

Have a good evening all.
